page.title: 16Dinas School-Working Callers
page.content: The{rubbish men}come in a light green and dark green coloured lorry. It is light green where the cab is and dark green where the container is. There are 3 helpers and 1 driver on the lorry.They wear green overalls and gloves.The lorry makes a funny sound when it reverses to warn people. The lorry comes usually when we are playing rounders. The{library man}comes in a bright blue van once every term.I think there are more than 1000 books in there.He is a cheerful man.About five children go out to get ten books each.Some times he helps us find the books.When we have finished the van goes to another school.The other children can not wait to read the new books - especially Lisa. {Gareth Curtis(8) {Georgina Strawbridge (8)
